title: Bug 15899: Close all saved does not work all the time
OB: Using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, when I create a new file f1.txt and select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, nothing happens.
EB: I expect that when I select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, all unsaved files should be closed.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Using build 20020508 with the latest UI code,
2. Create a new file 'f1.txt',
3. Select 'Close All Saved' option from the file menu.

Note: Ensure that there are unsaved files in the editor before selecting 'Close All Saved'
